meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sue Meloy Doug Thornton Andy Baggarly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6428.

td.p: Sue Meloy, a retired software engineer from Lincoln, California
Doug Thornton, an information technology manager from Chesterfield, Virginia
Andy Baggarly, a journalist and author from Palo Alto, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $60,402)

tr.td: ABBREVIATED MAGAZINES
THE 1870s
I'VE GOT A 6-PACK
ON BASS & DRUMS
(Alex: We want you to name the group.)
"GAS" UP
ODE TRIP

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
